review_and_appreciate:
Review and Appreciate: How much or how frequently were you able to experience being present yesterday? The
            Path is when you engage in the process of growth. Be on The Path.
quote: "Life is a succession of lessons which must be lived to be understood." Ralph Waldo Emerson

step_of_the_day.title:
The best way to learn to be present is to get a felt sense of the experience. Noticing what being present
            feels like (Pillar #7)
step_of_the_day.content: All the words on this page, in this book, cannot substitute for your experience. You cannot learn about being present, for example, from reading—only from holding the intension to be present. Eugene Gendlin introduced the concept of a “felt sense” as a way to feel into your inner experience. By doing so, you offer yourself an opportunity to uncover parts of you that have been hidden by your defenses and by simply being busy. It is also a way to connect your mind with your body and fully experience being present. Mr. Emerson, in his quote, says, if you want to really learn a lesson and understand it, it must be lived.

action_step:
As RWE says, if you want to really learn a lesson and understand it, it must be lived. Therefore, today it’s
            about being present, but then, most importantly, pay attention to how you feel and experience being present.
            This is The Path to getting it.
